name: Big Brothers #1
description:
100 Big Brothers (HBB), Generative Avatar Project.

Generative Art is a process of algorithmically generating new ideas, forms, shapes, colors or patterns. First, you create rules that provide boundaries for the creation process. Then a computer  follows those rules to produce new works on your behalf.

-
 A few noses, a few eyebrows, a few eyes and a few mustaches have formed 100 different brothers that we see in this Generative avatar project.
 
 have tried to make the production of this project as delicate as a traditional َartwork.


_
